title: NBA Preview - WC With Rachel Nichols, EC With Richard Jefferson and Army HC Jeff Monken
description:
We clean up MNF and the disaster the Steelers have become. (2:10-11:16) Mini preview of Week 16. (11:17-18:40) Hot Seat Cool Throne including Dwayne Haskins going to strip clubs. (19:20-32:54) Army Football Coach Jeff Monken joins the show to talk about Armyâ€™s season, finding a bowl game, and the last of the hards.(34:12-54:09) Western Conference preview with Rachel Nichols, surprising teams, the Clippers hating each other and load management. (56:07-1:20:24) Eastern Conference preview with Richard Jefferson, Kyrie, team chemistry and expectations for the Bucks.(1:22:26-1:57:29) We finish with guys on chicks (1:59:08-2:11:30)


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/PardonMyTake
